Articles.Content:
Pretty much what the title says lol. I have been reading the forums for a very long time and playing for longer but finally decided to start posting. Then thought I should introduce myself.

Any suggestions on what to do next?

Hello, @CastleKSide, and welcome aboard!

I too was a lurker for a while before joining.

As for suggestions- tell everyone what you did today in the What did you do in KSP today? thread! Catch up on all the stuff in the Mission Reports subforum, or write your own! Find something fun to do in Forum Games! Go over the Forum Rules and Good Conduct Guide, so you don't break any rules! Let everyone know your thoughts about the new KSP DLC in the KSP: Making History Grand Discussion thread!

It's great to have you here!

Welcome, I too just joined after lurking for a while. This forum is one of the most helpful and respectful communities i've joined for a game and i've joined a few.

I've learned so much from this forum.I could read for hours here.
